features.title: Standardized libraries
features.desc: Experience predefined standard data models with synced data for easy access development using blocks.

features.title: Modular
features.desc: Explore the full range of composable app development with easy-to-use blocks to build infinitely scalable products.

features.title: Reusable
features.desc: Ensure maximum flexibility with reusable blocks, both public and private that can be managed and shared across teams.

features.title: Easy integration
features.desc: With GitHub integration, simplify app development process with automatic testing and deployment of commits, pull requests, and forks.

features.title: Maintenability
features.desc: Easy to update and bug fix. The Appblocks platform grows with ever-changing industry standards, providing regular updates and bug fixes for a seamless experience.

features.title: Seamless deployment
features.desc: Users can either develop on-premise or utilize cloud-first development, preventing unneeded technology lock-ins.

features.title: Collaboration
features.desc: Manage your organization, apps, blocks, teams, and more in one space.

customers.name: Johny Costo
customers.desc: For my agency, Appblocks has been a game changer. With the click of a button, I can create a complete landing page. I receive 5 different variations of content so that I can choose the one that I like best. Moreover, the content rewriting feature is top-notch.
